long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The DigitalRecruiter™ Chrome Extension revolutionizes executive hiring by seamlessly integrating with LinkedIn. It efficiently extracts essential user details such as Name, Title, Current Company, and Location, automatically storing them in a long-list on the DigitalRecruiter™ App. Recruiters experience heightened productivity as CV sourcing and list building are streamlined. This innovative tool ensures a seamless and efficient recruitment process, empowering recruiters to focus on finding the best talent. Elevate your hiring strategy with the DigitalRecruiter™ Chrome Extension, where efficiency meets excellence in executive recruitment.
